entry.title: Lytmi Lightstrip - Neo Box Required
entry.summary:
Vendor: 2021lightmi
Type:
Price: 69.00 - 119.00 (15 variants)

Next level of TV backlights

This advanced backlights can sync with TV, gaming consoles or other HDMI devices and display their color.

Make lights beat with music

Lets you create immersive lights shows that seamlessly follow the beats.

Transform your gaming setup

Build an immersive gaming experience, every effects will be amplified.

Lighting for movie

Sync smart lights with TV makes an immersive viewing experience.

Super Bright

The brightness of each lightstrip up to 3400lm.

Easy to install

4 corner brackets and 6 parallel brackets included, make it easy to attach to the back of screen.

.

Fit Any Size

The lightstrip comes in three size, fit up to 120 inch screen.

ARGB Control

Each RGB LED (or segment/block of RGB LEDs) can display a different colour and intensity than its neighbors.

Accurate Color Reproduction

Hardware auto adaptive support for accurate colors reproduction, hardly can any colors and effects misproduction be seen.

Cuttable Design

The LED lightstrips can be easily cut, you can customize the length of lights to fit your screen better.

Perfect aligned with the box

Use Lytmi App to control your lightstrips and custom your unique lightning experience.

What's in the box?

2 x Light Strip Coils

 

6 x Fixing Brackets

Expand Your Smart Home with Neo

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.

entry.title: Screen Strip Light for Windows PC
entry.summary:
Vendor: 2021lightmi
Type:
Price: 69.99 - 118.30 (15 variants)

Ambient Lighting System

Brings you the immersive experience.

Immersive gaming experience

An easy way to enhance your gaming experience, increase the anxiety of chasing, amplify every action effects.

Music & Mic sync

Lighting color will change with the music beats, hands claps, or gaming sounds through built-in microphone.

Gaming setup upgrades

Capture the color on your screen and apply them on lightstrips, it is an amazing game room design idea.

Fit a wide range of size

Lytmi software has auto calibration function, support 17-55 inch monitors, including: modern standard (16:9), old standard (4:3), ultrawide (21:9), superwide (32:9).

Neon strip light

The strip light equipped with ARGB LEDs to ensure the high accuracy in reproduction. Silicone cover to make it hard to be damaged and enable a large illuminated area.

 

High accuracy in reproduction

Lytmi can detective the color on screen and apply them on ARGB light strips result in high accuracy color reproduction.

Support multiple-monitor

Open the desktop software multiple times to achieve multi-screen synchronization. (Note: each screen requires one set of lights)

Multiple preset scene mode

Lytmi software includes 3 sync modes, 3 music modes (spectrum, electronic, and lyricism) and 12 scene modes like rainbow, fire, star, swing and etc.

Easy to control

Except for controlled by software, strip lights can also controlled by a control box which can be used to turn on and off the strip lights and change different modes.

Relieve eye pressure

Reduce eye strain when watching monitors at night with back lighting.

What's in the box?

1 x Controller

 

1 x LED Strips Roll

 

1 x AC Power Adapter

 

2 x Corner mounting brackets

 

6 x Adhesive mounting clips

Desktop Lighting System

Ltymi unlocks new immersive gaming experience.

Ltymi unlocks new immersive gaming experience.

Ltymi unlocks new immersive gaming experience.

Ltymi unlocks new immersive gaming experience.

entry.title: Lytmi Neo Sync Box - HDMI 2.0
entry.summary:
Vendor: 2021lightmi
Type:
Price: 99.00 - 125.00 (5 variants)

Full Immersion Experience

A magic box to let you enjoy immersive experience at home.

Upgrade your home theater

Create an ultimate home theater setup, enjoy amazing smart lighting experience.

Reactive lighting with games

Saving your teammate? Chasing a boss? Racing with friends? Whatever the game, your game experience will be enhanced.

Make your music visual

Sync lights with dynamic sounds, enhance your musical experience.

Upgraded model - HDMI 2.0

Seamless sync experience with Neo sync box, support high quality video: 4K/60Hz, HDR 10, Dolby Vision.

App control

Except for sync mode, multiple scene modes present in Light Mi APP, 12 scene modes and 3 music modes.

 

Black bar auto refill

Neo equip with auto refill function, automatically compensate the light for the black side of the movie, giving you the perfect home theater atmosphere.

Voice Control

Control Neo box through Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, expand your smart home.

Maximum Compatibility

No calibration, no bridge, just pair it with any HDMI devices, Apple TV, Amazon Fire Stick, Xbox, PlayStation, Mac transform your living room into a theatrical piece of art.

Softening Algorithms

Neo set 3 sync speed to make sure when the onscreen content changes even rapidly, the lights will sync the colors and effects in a way that’s is eyes-friendly.

What's in the box?

1 x Lytmi Neo Box

 

1 x HDMI Cable

 

1 x AC Power Adapter

Expand Your Smart Home with Neo

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.

entry.title: Lytmi Neo Sync Box & TV Backlight Kit - HDMI 1.4
entry.summary:
Vendor: 2021lightmi
Type:
Price: 119.99 - 192.00 (15 variants)

Full Immersion Experience

A magic box to unblock full surround lighting in your home.

Next Level Visual Experience

Brings the cinema home

The color of lights will sync to what display of your movies and TV shows.

New gaming experience

Build an immersive gaming experience, every effects will be amplified.

Sound-to-light show

Neo box is equipped with a built-in mic, helping you sync them to music.

ARGB Advantage

Each Neo lightstrip has 48 ARGB LEDs/m. Each LED can display a different color and brightness than its neighbors.

Fit All Screen Size

The light strip is cuttable design, make it easy to attach to the back of screen in any size. The Neo box will auto calibrate the light strips.

 

Accurate Color Reproduction

Neo can process up to 500 pixel dot, ensuring a high accuracy of color reproduction via the lightstrips in sync mode.

Control In Your Way

By controlling the ambient light with Light Mi APP or voice commands through Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, you will savor the true meaning of smartness by adjusting everything ranging from colors, effects to brightness with just a simple click or slide.

Seamless Synchronization

The Lytmi NEO Box and TV Backlight will definitely amaze you with the unprecedented immersive atmosphere created to render you an ultimate movie and TV show watching experience. You can just bring the cinema home.

Endless Possibilities

Connect to a huge range of devices via HDMI. Works with Apple TV, Xbox, PlayStation and Mac & Windows and many more. Just plug in and play up to 4K/30hz.

Auto Black Bar Refill

Neo can auto refill the black bar in all movies TV series and video games, apply their color on lightstrips.

What's in the box?

1 x Lytmi Neo box

 

2 x Light Strip Coils

 

1 x HDMI Cable

 

1 x AC Power Adapter

 

4 x Fixing Brackets for light strips

Expand Your Smart Home with Neo

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.

entry.title: Lytmi Neo Sync Box & TV Backlight Kit - HDMI 2.0 (Est shipping time Dec 29)
entry.summary:
Vendor: 2021lightmi
Type:
Price: 169.00 - 267.00 (15 variants)

Full Immersion Experience

A magic box that unblocks full surround lighting in your home.

Lighting for movies

Sync smart lights with your TV to make an immersive viewing experience.

Transform your gaming setup

Amplify every action, feel the thrill of a chase, upgrade your gaming experience.

Sync up your music

Create immersive light shows that seamlessly sync to the beat.

Upgraded Model - HDMI 2.0

Seamless sync experience with Neo sync box, support high quality video: 4K/60Hz, HDR 10, Dolby Vision.

Fit All Screen Size

The light strip is cuttable design, make it easy to attach to the back of screen in any size. The Neo box will auto calibrate the light strips.

 

Upgraded Lightstrip

The upgraded light strip is now equipped with a special designed silicone cover, enabling the light to shine a larger area due to an illumintion angle shift from 90° to 45°.

Accurate Color Reproduction

Neo can process up to 500 pixel dot and apply them to lightstrip with ARGB LED, to ensure the high accuracy of color reproduction in sync mode.

CEC Enabled

Consumer Electronics Control (CEC) Feature. Use only one remote controller to turn on/off TV, Neo box and other HDMI connected devices.

Endless Possibilities

Connect to a huge range of devices via HDMI. Works with Apple TV, Xbox, PlayStation and Mac & Windows and many more. Just plug in and play.

Black Bar Auto Refill

Neo equip with auto refill function, automatically compensate the light for the black side of the movie, giving you the perfect home theater atmosphere.

What's in the box?

1 x Lytmi Neo box

 

2 x Light Strip Coils

 

1 x HDMI Cable

 

1 x AC Power Adapter

 

10 x Fixing Brackets for light strips

Expand Your Smart Home with Neo

Want to control your Neo box with your smartphone? Install Lytmi App to and set it up to your Neo box.
